parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

requests.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Est odio nihil.","description":"Molestiae non accusantium. Similique sed est. Temporibus qui nesciunt. Sequi non quibusdam. Quidem libero enim.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-02-14","end_at":"2019-02-16","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]}}}
